alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with exceptionally frequent lightning over Floyd and Harrison Counties... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms with intense lightning along a line extending from near New Albany to near Corydon. Movement was southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Intense dangerous lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Very frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Stay inside until the storms have passed. Locations impacted include... Corydon, Galena, Lanesville, Crandall, New Salisbury, Edwardsville, Breckenridge, and Byrneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Stay off land line phones and avoid plumbing.
